column5: Heading up to Eagle Lake next week, does anyone know of a Bait Shop in Fort Frances we could buy some leeches. Our camp told me thet they are kind of hard to get. I thought surely somewhere in Fort Frances we could find some. Thanks Jim

If you are going to Eagle you will be heading east on HWY 11 before you head up 502. You can find leeches at Rainy Lake sports right as you get onto 11 east or you can head to the great bear, about 10 minutes east of town. Either one should have a decent supply of leeches.
